transArray.content: The hotel is very close to Chaoyang Railway Station, only a few minutes' walk, and it is easy to find. At the intersection of Yaojiayuan Road and Shifoying Road, there is a Dayali Hotel at the door. It is very convenient to eat nearby, and it is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City for shopping. Very cost-effective, very satisfied!

Your satisfaction is the biggest motivation for our work. Hanting Chaoyang Railway Station has always provided the most sincere and enthusiastic service to bring every guest a home away from home experience. Your smile is our best reward. Thank you for your choice and look forward to it. See you again and wish you a happy life!
